Constructors

SimpleStructuredBuffer(GraphicsDevice, uint, uint, ShaderStages, bool, bool)

Initializes a new instance of the SimpleStructuredBuffer<THeader, TElement> class with the specified device, sizes, shader stages, and usage options.

public SimpleStructuredBuffer(GraphicsDevice graphicsDevice, uint headerDataSize, uint elementDataSize, ShaderStages stages, bool readOnly = true, bool rawBuffer = false)

Parameters

graphicsDevice GraphicsDevice

The graphics device used to create the buffer.

headerDataSize uint

The number of header entries to allocate.

elementDataSize uint

The number of element entries to allocate.

stages ShaderStages

The shader stages where this buffer will be bound.

readOnly bool

Whether the buffer is read-only (default: true).

rawBuffer bool

Whether the buffer is treated as raw (default: false).
